title: Semifinal breakdown: Chiefs vs Team Immunity

replies.body: These articles are pretty poorly written to be honest. Really looking forward to the finals though.

Hi. I wrote the article :)
What is it about it that you don't like? The writing style generally or anything specific?

I think what we feel when reading the article is that it's written in a personal tone rather than a professional tone, using phrases like ''funnily enough'' and speaking for the team's mindset. Yes the upset with 4not is a bit ironic but it's also slightly disrespectful to write it that way you did. It comes across as you're writing this to inform your friends of what happened instead of making a non bias article recapping the events of iM vs Chiefs.
He's just looking to stir trouble, it's written well as far as I can tell :)

"Team Immunity’s has been an ongoing struggle to stay in playoffs contention"

Just one example. They haven't even proofread or tied off all their notes to themselves. ^_^;
Sorry, I wasn't intending to personally offend you. I guess I'm just more used to reading the more professionally written NA and EU articles, don't take me wrong though this is a great first attempt.

the article is well written. Its there to give an insight to the history of the teams, not for your amusement. 

Also does anyone know why 'vods' are missing from the OPL?
